task.title: Deploying the Data Power Data Collector
task.shortdesc: How to deploy the DataPower data collector in your environment.

taskbody.prereq: Before using the DataPower data collector proxy, you must upgrade the firmware on DataPower appliances that you want to monitor, to include the necessary monitoring and data transformation capabilities.

step.cmd: Configure your DataPower appliances for monitoring (see Configuring the DataPower appliance for monitoring for details).
Enable the DataPower data collector (see Enabling data collection for details).
Run the startDC script to start the data collector (see Starting and stopping the data collector for details), or configure the data collector to run in the background and start the background task.
